page.title: 11LONG EATON. The Urban Area.
page.content: This area is diverse in many ways. There is a variety of housing - detached, semi-detached and terraced. The houses are of a variety of ages, mainly Victorian, Pre First World War and Modern. Some of the houses are privately owned and some rented. Some of the Council housing is, now privately owned. Most areas have easy access to Long Eaton centre for a variety of amenities. Small shopping areas exist within the area studied. These vary from shopping streets to small corner shops. None of the area has entertainment facilities other than pubs, and there is little in the way of safe playing facilities for children.
